name: Dark Empire
description: Hello Captain, I am proud to announce that you are now manager of the mining colony "Astra". But we are at war and you have been designated to defend this colony! An enemy flagship goes to your colony, find a way to stop it.Welcome to "Dark Empire", you will take place as manager of a small mining colony.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512Mb graphic memory, 1280x720 minimum Storage: 150 MB available space Additional Notes: 1920x1080 RECOMMENDED
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1024Mb graphic memory, 1920x1080 (Recommended) Storage: 150 MB available space
